title: Engineering
no choice cards: No card choice available. Please wait...
card auxPower desc: Increases system power by 1 for 60s, removes aux power from other systems
card storeCharge desc: Decreases system power by 1 for 30s, then adds a Stored Charge card to your hand
card relocate desc: Mark a system to be moved, and add a card to your hand that lets you specify which syste it should swap with
card relocateHere desc: Specify where the system with the Relocating effect should be moved to
card divertHull desc: Reduce hull power by up to 3 for 12s, add removed power to target system
card divertShields desc: Reduce shield power by up to 3 for 12s, add removed power to target system
card divertSensors desc: Reduce sensor power by up to 3 for 12s, add removed power to target system
card divertWeapons desc: Reduce weapon power by up to 3 for 12s, add removed power to target system
card divertEngines desc: Reduce engine power by up to 3 for 12s, add removed power to target system
card divertReactor desc: Reduce reactor power by up to 3 for 12s, add removed power to target system
card overcharge desc: Increase system power by 2 for 10s, dealing 25 damage
card reactorOverload desc: Add 1 power to every system for 12s, then deal 50 damage to the reactor
card purge desc: Remove a negative effect from the target system
card reset desc: Disable system for 2 seconds, then remove all effects
card rewind desc: Restarts the progress on all active effects on the target system
card boost1 desc: Boosts a system's power by 1 for 15s
card boost2 desc: Boosts a system's power by 2 for 12s
card overload desc: Boosts a system's power by 3 for 12s, then damages it
card swapSystems desc: Swaps the position of the selected system with the one below it
card coldRestart desc: Repair 75 damage, but drain all power from target system for 12 seconds
card hotSwap desc: Drain all power from target system for 3 seconds, then repair 30 damage
card superCharge desc: Damages adjacent systems, boosts a system's power by 4 for 10s, then damages it
